016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.Map.Entry;
020
021/**
022 * Base class for lipid names parsed using the different grammars. This can
023 * contain a lipid, an adduct and a sum formula.
024 *
025 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
026 * @author Nils Hoffmann
027 */
028public final class LipidAdduct {
029
030    private final LipidSpecies lipid;
031    private final Adduct adduct;
032
033    public LipidAdduct(LipidSpecies lipid, Adduct adduct) {
034        this.lipid = lipid;
035        this.adduct = adduct;
036    }
037
038    public String getLipidString() {
039        return getLipidString(LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL);
040    }
041
042    public String getLipidString(LipidLevel level) {
043        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
044        if (lipid != null) {
045            sb.append(lipid.getLipidString(level));
046        } else {
047            return "";
048        }
049
050        switch (level) {
051            case CLASS:
052            case CATEGORY:
053                break;
054
055            default:
056                if (adduct != null) {
057                    sb.append(adduct.getLipidString());
058                }
059                break;
060        }
061
062        return sb.toString();
063    }
064
065    public String getClassName() {
066        return (lipid != null) ? lipid.headGroup.getClassName() : "";
067    }
068
069    @JsonIgnore
070    public boolean isLyso() {
071        return (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()).specialCases.contains("Lyso") : false;
072    }
073
074    @JsonIgnore
075    public boolean isCardioLipin() {
076        return (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()).specialCases.contains("Cardio") : false;
077    }
078
079    @JsonIgnore
080    public boolean isContainsSugar() {
081        return (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()).specialCases.contains("Sugar") : false;
082    }
083
084    @JsonIgnore
085    public boolean isContainsEster() {
086        return (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()).specialCases.contains("Ester") : false;
087    }
088
089    @JsonIgnore
090    public boolean isSpException() {
091        return (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(lipid.headGroup.getLipidClass()).specialCases.contains("SP_Exception") : false;
092    }
093
094    public LipidLevel getLipidLevel() {
095        return lipid.getLipidLevel();
096    }
097
098    public String getExtendedClass() {
099        return (lipid != null) ? lipid.getExtendedClass() : "";
100    }
101
102    public double getMass() {
103        ElementTable elements = getElements();
104        int charge = 0;
105        double mass = 0;
106
107        if (adduct != null) {
108            charge = adduct.getCharge();
109        }
110
111        for (Entry<Element, Integer> kvp : elements.entrySet()) {
112            mass += Elements.ELEMENT_MASSES.get(kvp.getKey()) * kvp.getValue();
113        }
114
115        if (charge != 0) {
116            mass = (mass - charge * Elements.ELECTRON_REST_MASS) / Math.abs(charge);
117        }
118
119        return mass;
120    }
121
122    @JsonIgnore
123    public ElementTable getElements() {
124        ElementTable elements = new ElementTable();
125
126        if (lipid != null) {
127            ElementTable lipid_elements = lipid.getElements();
128            for (Entry<Element, Integer> kv : lipid_elements.entrySet()) {
129                elements.put(kv.getKey(), elements.get(kv.getKey()) + kv.getValue());
130            }
131        }
132
133        if (adduct != null) {
134            ElementTable adduct_elements = adduct.getElements();
135            for (Entry<Element, Integer> kv : adduct_elements.entrySet()) {
136                elements.put(kv.getKey(), elements.get(kv.getKey()) + kv.getValue());
137            }
138        }
139        return elements;
140    }
141
142    @Override
143    public String toString() {
144        return LipidAdduct.this.getLipidString();
145    }
146
147    public String getSumFormula() {
148        return getElements().getSumFormula();
149    }
150
151    public LipidSpecies getLipid() {
152        return lipid;
153    }
154
155    public Adduct getAdduct() {
156        return adduct;
157    }
158
159}
